title: I Ain't Scared of Living
description:
by Gabrielz

Kirishima always wanted to help people at a young age. He couldn’t get a job before, so he resulted to using YouTube. He began his video generalized. He talked about how to deal with a loss of motivation, how to be happier, and his videos were later like Q&As where people asked him to help them with a situation, and he would make a video on it. He didn’t think this type of career would get him far, but he was surprised.

Now updating twice a week, and making videos with his friends, he got known for helping people. Soon enough, he gets to help one of his inspirations, ExplosionMurder Cooks and gets closer to him as a result. He gets more involved in the process, but he doesn’t mind. After all, he loves helping people.

(there will be a character death, but no graphic descriptions, so no blood or anything)

blog.name: malereaderwriting
blog.title:
Requests: Closed!
inbox: 8
blog.description:
Hi!! I write BNHA/male!reader, since in the fandom a lot of self inserts are centered around a female reader. (i will write gender-neutral reader but only if it is requested).You can request matchups, headcannons, or imagines! Search #request for more info!

(REQUESTS FOR MATCHUPS ARE ALWAYS OPEN)

summary: Relationship headcanons for Mina, Momo and Uraraka?
question: Relationship headcanons for Mina, Momo and Uraraka?
answer:
Hope you enjoy!!

Mina

-She loves dragging you around to parties with her. She’s pretty popular, and gets invited to many, so there’s never really a boring night. Of course, she won’t force you to go, but she loves showing you off to her girl friends!! She wants people to know that you’re *hers*!

-Mina’s definitely the jealous type. If anyone flirted with you she would be so upset with them. She’d never fight or hurt anyone, just prove that you are hers. One time a girl in her third year was flirting with you, you obviously were uncomfortable and were trying to signal her to stop. Mina saw what was going on, walked up to you, and without a word she kissed you passionately right in front of her. It definitely worked, and now girls know not to make a move on her man.

-Her friends definitely tease you, but never with bad intentions. Sometimes they’ll say something to you just to see how Mina would react. It’s usually vulgar, and she always scolds them while blushing.

Uraraka

-She had a huge crush on you for months before you two got together. She could barely talk to you without her entire face turning red.

-When you asked her out in the first place, she was so shocked that she kinda lost control of her quirk and just floated up to the ceiling. She said yes, and apologized profusely after she got back down.

-The morning after you two first got together, you woke up to about 50 texts from your female classmates promising that they’ll kill you if you broke her heart. When you told Ochako, she was so embarrassed about the entire thing, you thought it was adorable.

-your go-to date with her is a picnic on a sunny afternoon. After school, you’ll stop by her dorm with a bouquet of flowers, a picnic basket, and a blanket for you guys to sit on. You walk to the park together and spend the rest of the day in each other’s company.

-Buying gifts for her is the most fun thing because of her reactions. On valentines day you got her a heart shaped necklace that she hasn’t taken off since.

Momo

-Hoo boy this girl spoils you. She’s so nonchalant about it too. Point out a band you like when a song of theirs comes on the radio? The next day you wake up to two tickets for their latest tour on your counter.

-Her hair oh my god. Even though she has it up most of the time, when she’s around you she takes it down because she loves when you run your fingers through it. You’re not complaining, her hair is silky and smells good and her head laid on your chest makes your heart melt.

-She doesn’t really understand why anyone would want to be in a relationship until she met you. In fact, you were her first crush. She would stay up late and vent to Jirou about you. Jirou was also the one who convinced you to shoot your shot with Momo, since she knew Yaomomo liked you back.

-She thinks PDA is unprofessional, the most you’ll get is a peck on the cheek. It’s nothing personal, just not her thing. She’s much more affectionate in private.

-Anniversaries and holidays are very important to her. You both tend to go big on these occasions. It’s usually a fancy dinner at an overpriced restaurant, since you both enjoy the food and her family has the money to spare.

-Her friends definitely tease you, but never with bad intentions. Sometimes they’ll say something to you just to see how Mina would react. It’s usually vulgar, and she always scolds them while blushing.

Uraraka

-She had a huge crush on you for months before you two got together. She could barely talk to you without her entire face turning red.

-When you asked her out in the first place, she was so shocked that she kinda lost control of her quirk and just floated up to the ceiling. She said yes, and apologized profusely after she got back down.

-The morning after you two first got together, you woke up to about 50 texts from your female classmates promising that they’ll kill you if you broke her heart. When you told Ochako, she was so embarrassed about the entire thing, you thought it was adorable.

-your go-to date with her is a picnic on a sunny afternoon. After school, you’ll stop by her dorm with a bouquet of flowers, a picnic basket, and a blanket for you guys to sit on. You walk to the park together and spend the rest of the day in each other’s company.

-Buying gifts for her is the most fun thing because of her reactions. On valentines day you got her a heart shaped necklace that she hasn’t taken off since.

Momo

-Hoo boy this girl spoils you. She’s so nonchalant about it too. Point out a band you like when a song of theirs comes on the radio? The next day you wake up to two tickets for their latest tour on your counter.

-Her hair oh my god. Even though she has it up most of the time, when she’s around you she takes it down because she loves when you run your fingers through it. You’re not complaining, her hair is silky and smells good and her head laid on your chest makes your heart melt.

-She doesn’t really understand why anyone would want to be in a relationship until she met you. In fact, you were her first crush. She would stay up late and vent to Jirou about you. Jirou was also the one who convinced you to shoot your shot with Momo, since she knew Yaomomo liked you back.

-She thinks PDA is unprofessional, the most you’ll get is a peck on the cheek. It’s nothing personal, just not her thing. She’s much more affectionate in private.

-Anniversaries and holidays are very important to her. You both tend to go big on these occasions. It’s usually a fancy dinner at an overpriced restaurant, since you both enjoy the food and her family has the money to spare.

blog.description: This is my MHA side blog and love for twice daily. Every day the same image of twice posted twice here. It's gotta be posted twice. Let me ramble about how I love the LoV and Precepts and Everyone basically (We all know the exceptions)Ask box is open to answer questions imagines HCs with people.

summary: You you do some headcanons of twice with a tsundere girlfriend
question: You you do some headcanons of twice with a tsundere girlfriend
answer:
At first he completely understands them being safeguarded at the beginning and gives her some space but he does have a good interest in her. He tries to make her warm up with his normal goofy demeanour.

If that fails then he does give her some more space and hopefully that was enough before to make her see shes that the guy is at the bar kinda have given up for a few days to be her close close friend.

As soon as he sees her sit beside him you see him light up offering to get her a drink with a smile. It is a slow but rewarding process to get a smile or any information out of her on what she likes. He wants to get her the things she likes and no matter how gruff a person can be everyone should have a heart inside.

Even after they have dated for a while and they do start dating. Twice has picked up on her tells, and she knows his tells. It is rare but he keeps a spot open on the couch for a snuggle and puts up with the jokes of how he is smothering her.

Twice no matter what leaves some gifts around and tries to not burden her with his work. He tries to be tough for her but sometimes needs to get things off his chest. He always offer to do the same for her.

blog.name: amusedyan
blog.title: MusingYan
blog.description: A blog for my yandere content: Requests are Open

summary: You know I haven't seen a yandere Nejire could you change that?
question: You know I haven't seen a yandere Nejire could you change that?
answer:
You know, you’re right. I don’t think I’ve seen a yan Nejire on here either.

Glad to assist!

Nejire likes to glomp you when you aren’t looking.

She calls it a joke.

Her favorite time to do it is when you’re walking along with your friends to class, interrupting your conversation. She never hurts you, that’s not why she does it.

But she’s so cheerful and so in love, it makes your friends smile and leave you two alone, never mind that you keep looking after them, silently begging them to just look at you, do you look like you love her back? 

But it always works, and she’s free to press herself against your arm and pepper your face with kisses.

“Yay! Now we can talk!” She cheers and finally you call her on it, because you were really into that conversation.

“We can talk with my friends, though,” you tried, and her smile fades so fast it’s like it evaporated.

“But you don’t need to talk to them. You have me. Why would you need anyone else?”

And then she pulls you away.
